CONVENTION VOTE
N A E B
In accordance with action taken at the Ames, Iowa, convention the
Executive Secretary is now polling the membership requesting your
preference regarding the meeting place for the 1940 annual fall
convention* Please list your order of preferences
Chicago
St0 kouis
Dates for the conventions
September 2 and 3
September 7 and 8
August 30 and 31
Please vote now and return tot
Frank E0- Schooley
Executive Secretary, NASB
362 Administration Bldg*
Urbana, Illinois
